Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2009 09:50AM - edited Aug 11, 2009 09:51AM by DoubleMammyWhammy Jayne--thank you for asking about the fuzzy white hair and  Jane thanks for letting me know it's normal and will shed.  It is so nice to have support and answers.  I can't imagine going through this without these boards.  I have taken a picture of my hair growth every week and it is surprising to see the growth in 12 weeks--it makes me feel better to see any progress.   It just went curly in the past 2 weeks so I'm enjoying it while it lasts plus color has improved it from the mousy (rodent, even) I was sporting.  I wish we could buy Patience sprinkles.  I've become a more patient patient, but sometimes it is hard! Hang in there!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2009 08:55PM DoubleMammyWhammy wrote: I'm 5 months PFC and have an inch of curly hair.  My eyelashes are thinning or on some regrowth cycle.  I had lost them completely in March and the replacements were long and curly.  I swear even the hair on my arms is different!
